sentences.en: A glassmaker places a rounded piece of clay material on the end of a long metal stick.
sentences.cn: 一个玻璃制造商的地方长的金属棍年底的粘土材料的圆形片。

sentences.en: It includes Intel and Qualcomm, both chipmakers; Yum! Brands, which owns KFC and other restaurant chains; Boeing, which makes aircraft; and Corning, a glassmaker.
sentences.cn: 进入《经济学人》制表采集对象范围的就有芯片制造商英特尔和高通，旗下有肯德基等一系列知名餐饮连锁店的百胜餐饮集团，波音公司，以及玻璃制造商康宁公司。

sentences.en: The first documentary mention of a Venetian glassmaker is found on a deed of donation in 982 to the Benedictine monastery on the island of San Giorgio Maggiore by a Domenico.
sentences.cn: 公元982年，在一份向圣•乔治•马吉奥莱岛上的本笃会修道院捐赠物品的契约中，首次提到了威尼斯的玻璃工匠。

sentences.en: This start to finish aspect of glassware manufacture places added burdens on the glassmaker.
sentences.cn: 整个从头到尾的玻璃器皿制造过程给玻璃工人带来了很多难题.

words.tran_cn: 像玻璃的；光亮透明的；呆滞的
